dialogue.text: Returning to my room, I eagerly awaited the tooth fairy. Sitting on my bed, I reached into my pocket and rummaged through my candy wrappers, searching for my tooth.
Finding it and pulling it out of my pocket, I clenched my fist and continued to wait for her. While waiting, I accidentally fell asleep sitting up.
I woke up to the same unpleasant crack as last night.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Hey kid, what's up with the tooth? Did you find it?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Yes! I found it!
Opening my palm, I found that the tooth had disappeared.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Hey, are you kidding me?!

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Wait, I had it in my hands just now, honestly!
He made a displeased face and looked at me angrily.
I immediately started searching and found it under the pillow, along with my tooth.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Here, look! Mine and the one I found!
I said, almost shouting with joy, and held out my palm with two teeth to the fairy.
He looked happily at my hand and wiped the drool that had flowed at the sight of the teeth.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Ahem, well, is it time to fly?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: What, right now?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: You have to swallow both teeth and jump, only then can I conjure wings for you.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: That sounds scary... Are you sure you're not lying?

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: What, do you doubt me, kid?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Okay, I believe you, just let me say goodbye to my house.

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: Hurry up, while there's still time.
I put the teeth in my pocket and decided to walk through the rooms one last time. I'll start with the bathroom.
